title: Handle Item Going Out of Stock During Checkout
description: A customer has an item in their cart, but by the time they reach the final checkout step, another customer has bought the last unit.

tasks.description: At the final 'Place Order' step, re-verify inventory for all items in the cart.
tasks.expected_outcome: System checks stock levels one last time before processing payment.

tasks.description: If an item is now out of stock, block the order from completing.
tasks.expected_outcome: System prevents the order from being placed.

tasks.description: Display a clear message to the customer explaining which item is no longer available and automatically remove it from their cart.
tasks.expected_outcome: Customer is clearly informed of the issue and can proceed to purchase the remaining items.
